segments.text: I am so excited to be voting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know who you ’ re going to vote for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am so impressed with the candidate I ’ m going to vote for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s so great about him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel that he is very intelligent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and I agree with all his policies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think this man is going to be the next President .

segments.text: I ’ m going to make sure and get my vote in .
